title: Clear Street Slashes IPO Target 65% After Investor Pushback
description: Clear Street Group Inc. slashed the targeted size of its initial public offering by nearly two thirds, after the broker faced pushback from prospective investors.
content: Clear Street Group Inc. slashed the targeted size of its initial public offering by nearly two thirds, after the broker faced pushback from prospective investors.
